H0.text: Which duo had a hit album entitled Sweet Dreams (Are Made of This). Depeche Mode

H1.text: Which duo had a hit album entitled Sweet Dreams (Are Made of This). The Human League

H2.text: Which duo had a hit album entitled Sweet Dreams (Are Made of This). Erasure

H3.text: Which duo had a hit album entitled Sweet Dreams (Are Made of This). Eurythmix

A4.text: They achieved global acclaim with their second album, Sweet Dreams (Are Made of This) (1983).

A5.text: The title track became a worldwide hit, reaching number two in the UK Singles Chart, and number one in Canada and on the US Billboard Hot 100.

A6.text: Sweet Dreams (Are Made of This) is a song by British synth-pop duo Eurythmics.

A7.text: It was the first single released by Eurythmics in the United States.

A8.text: Sweet Dreams (Are Made of This) (album), by Eurythmics, or the title song (see below), 1983

A9.text: Eurythmics, a British rock/pop duo, released Sweet Dreams (Are Made of This).

A10.text: The album reached number three in the UK and was certified platinum.
